titles.title: Child Restraints in Cars (tax credit)
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit for the purchase of child restraint systems used in motor vehicles.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S572)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax credit for the cost of purchasing a child restraint system for use in a motor vehicle.
